name: Conglomerate (ZGenStudio)
description:
A first person survival game

  • In this, you have to follow a mysterious voice and your own instinct to figure out something which soon changes everything and left the player feel alone but at last he(player) uncovers a truth which made him relax and happy.      
  • Thrilling and horrified environment mixed with suspenseful background music and effects.

 

  • A perfectly designed city to give the player best experience . Even on completing the game there's still some part of the city remain undiscovered. 

Controls:

W,A,S,D  - Movement

Mouse  - To Look

Left shift - Sprint

ESC - Pause

E - Interact

Disclaimer : This game has been made in 7 days.

Please Do comment and give your honest feedback.
